mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no cartNo , c.customer_mail customerMail , c.goods_no goodsNo , c.cart_amount cartAmount , c.update_date updateDate , c.create_date createDate , f.goods_file_origin goodsFileOrigin , f.goods_file_ext goodsFileExt , g.goods_title goodsTitle , g.goods_price goodsPrice FROM cart c LEFT OUTER JOIN goods_file f ON c.goods_no = f.goods_no LEFT OUTER JOIN goods g ON c.goods_no = g.goods_no WHERE customer_mail = #{customerMail};
